root: ^Just curious. Lot of people walking around thinking debts don’t catch up to them.
^Not my problem. I pay what I owe.

DebtHonorable: ^Not my problem. I pay what I owe.
^Hah. Rare to meet someone honest these days.
SuspiciousInquiry: ^Relax. Just a friendly question. But you might want to watch your back—someone else might not ask so nicely.
